PATIENT_ID: TEST_DROWNING_002
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-02-07 10:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-02-07 10:10:00
Category III activation for 70-year-old female with isolated hip injury
after mechanical fall at home. No loss of consciousness. No head injury.
BP 148/90, HR 68, RR 16, GCS 15.
Right hip tenderness and shortened externally rotated leg.

[IMAGING] 2026-02-07 10:30:00
AP pelvis x-ray: right intertrochanteric femur fracture.
No other injuries on imaging survey.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-02-07 10:50:00
Isolated right hip fracture. Orthopedic consult obtained.
Admitted for operative fixation. Medically optimized for surgery.
